synopsis.text: Western culture enthusiast Koume, the introverted Nono, and the diligent Kon. As they navigate the labyrinthine town teeming with witches and diviners, Chiya's quest for her missing mother takes center stage. With their unique skills and shared determination, these aspiring Uraras embark on an unforgettable journey, unraveling the mysteries of fortune-telling and forging unbreakable bonds along the way. Their adventure in Meirochou promises laughter, growth, and perhaps, the revelation of Chiya's elusive past.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
